website_summaries.verdict: If you're unable to lift heavy items or simply want the convenience of a wheeled model without the hefty price tag, this innovative rolling mop bucket is a solid choice.
pros: Universal shape fits all mop head styles
5-gallon capacity is more than adequate for home use
Graduated markings make it easier to measure liquids
Multi-directional wheels make maneuvering the bucket a breeze
Lift grip and pouring spout for easy emptying
cons: Some owners felt it was a bit too wide
Plastic handle isn't as sturdy as a metal model

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, I went to Walmart and Home Depot thinking I could find a small, wheeled mop bucket... no! So thank you, Amazon, for having this available. Received 2 days after ordering, just as advertised and very happy with the purchase and product.
customer_reviews.author: MIB

customer_reviews.title: QUICKIE BUCKET ON WHEELS
customer_reviews.text: We use this bucket for scrubbing and other chores. It is really handy and provides enough water for rinsing etc. We like the color and have a smaller blue bucket to match. The handle is great, the bucket is sturdy and the wheels work really well. We are seniors so this is very important. We have a large home to care for and appreciate this quality Quickie bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Bella SophiaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cheap super light weight plastic wont last
customer_reviews.text: Cheap super lightweight plastic won't last. Wheels are lightweight plastic, no heft to them. Don't roll easily. The whole bucket is thin and flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: gunny colvin

customer_reviews.title: The 👍 tub/bucket/pail ➕
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use it yet, but I'll be using it soon. Needed something larger enough to hold my 10" wide sponge mop. This will definitely work well. I knew when I saw that large box that was my order. ( I also think it's a good idea for tha Amazon driver/staff to take a photo of orders left in the entry way if no one answers immediately.) The wheels will be a helpful save the back addition. I think it will also work well for hand washables. Hoping it's adaptable for what's intended. And works as well as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L.

customer_reviews.title: Too big but love the wheels
customer_reviews.text: Great idea but a bit or bunch to big. I think the concept is a groom one but not for an oversized bucket. It would have better as a regular size bucket. It’s on the huge size which makes it difficult to maneuver can’t put in the sink and hard to dump. Would love to see this as a regular size bucket with the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Justme66

customer_reviews.title: A Wise Investment
customer_reviews.text: This bucket makes mopping so much easier. The handle has like a comfort grip so it does not dig in your hand when lifting a full bucket. It is also sooo easy to maneuver around as the wheels spin 360 degrees. I also love the built in pour spout. It also has a sheen to the inside coating that allows it to be easily rinsed out. Yes, this bucket is really freakin good and is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I expected! It is a very sturdy rolling mop bucket. I wish it had pour spouts on both sides but that's fairly minor. Highly recommend for anyone needing a rolling mop bucket that doesn't want the giant yellow professional one!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Larger opening bucket on swiveling wheels with pouring guide - what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea for a bucket! I like to use a mop on occasion, and this bucket has wheels so I don't need to haul it or slide it (and its contents slosh) and it has a pouring spout that helps me dispose of its contents without risking a spill. The picture shows a metal handle and metal on the wheels, but my handle is white plastic all around with black plastic caster 360 degree swiveling wheels. It holds 5 gallons of liquid & its opening is larger than many other buckets. HIghly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: R. Eye

customer_reviews.title: All Purpose Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Used this bucket for so many things including to hold ice salt and a general trash bin. Easy to roll and holds a lot. Still looks new after all its use. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Best mop bucket in have ever had but it is large . Rolls nicely and cleans up well . I love it . I use it with a libman wonder mop .
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Great Rolling Bucket except for label
customer_reviews.text: Love the bucket, it is a game changer. But took off a star due to the label on it. Took forever to scrape the label off, very annoying. Manufacturers need to do better with label glue.
customer_reviews.author: Ragtop Girl

customer_reviews.title: I'm so happy you carry this pail!
customer_reviews.text: I ruined my first pail of this kind and was afraid I'd never find another one. This is the best household pail, simple, easy to roll around and just the right size. Love it and so glad you had this online!
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Not a mop bucket!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is a 2 year-old who visits me regularly. He developed a liking for my mop bucket on wheels, but I couldn't let him play with it because it's dirty. I bought this Bucket on Wheels for my little buddy who puts his toys in it and rolls it all over the house. He gets a lot of exercise chasing that thing all day. I think it's one of the best purchases I've made in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Even my cat likes this bucket!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bucket. It isn't super heavy weight and industrial looking... it's actually pretty. It rolls easily and is easy to pick up and empty. Since it is easy to roll, my cat has trained me to give her "bucket rides" though the house. lol
customer_reviews.author: Anna Meow

customer_reviews.title: GREAT as far as mop buckets go
customer_reviews.text: I have had this same bucket for the past 6 years and it finally gave out on me. No longer available at the HD store where i bought it back then, only the expensive $60 and up ones, which do not fit my budget. So happy I was able to find it here on AMAZON and take advantage once again of my PRIME membership!! living in South Florida with a house of ALL tile floors, this bucket makes moving from room to room a breeze with its coasting wheels.
customer_reviews.author: butterfliesnbats

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect except for the price. Found one at target for half the price so I returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: j L

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic wheels, NOT "soft rubber"!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this bucket because the specs stated: "soft rubber wheels". They're hard plastic which can easily mar polished wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good bucket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an old one - nearly identical - that we use as a dog water bucket. It sprang a leak after about 12 years. The wheels are great for rolling it to the sink for fill-ups. The old one had a metal handle and looked sturdier all-around. This one is probably made cheaply in China, like most everything else nowadays. But if it's half as good it's worth 4 stars - pretty good bucket.
customer_reviews.author: W. Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: Not super sturdy plastic...but is doung the job so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Good bucket
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars because the handle attachment is weak. Last one I had broke off. However, the maneuverability, size , and usefullness is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Unique Bucket!
customer_reviews.text: This bucket was exactly what I needed and I happily found it on Amazon, of course! I wanted a larger bucket and one that would accept the wider applicators of multiple floor products. I like its flexibility, manueverability with its wheels, its size and weight. It is so easy to use. I recommend it for many purposes!
customer_reviews.author: Captain76

customer_reviews.title: Nice bucket
customer_reviews.text: Nice bucket, love the easy wheels, so much easier to move bucket room to room
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mop bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this product as I use it everyday to clean my floors as I have 4 dogs. I stand by my ratings and am extremely satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kijas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: My back saver. We are experiencing severe drought in San Diego, hence we are careful about water usage. I hand wash our dishes and save the rinse water to water the plants. I pour the water from the dish pan to this wheeled bucket and drag the bucket to the garden. Presto!
customer_reviews.author: linarey

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket! Easy to move, large enough to submerge the whole mop head.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Back saver
customer_reviews.text: Back saver, also high quality plastic material, I'm glad I did buy it
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Well made, light weight and functional
customer_reviews.text: Added this item to my PCP / scuba tank fill station as the water reservoir to submerge the water pump used to cool my high pressure compressor. The bucket wheels and sturdy handle added the convenience of use I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: MAGPRO INC

customer_reviews.title: Rolls easily and no marks on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of carrying heavy water buckets so I splurged on this. Wish I had done this earlier and avoided strain to my back. The bucket glides easily, leaves no marks, and is very sturdy. I particularly like the handle which is anti-slip with ridges and is of a pretty big diameter. The handle is 100% plastic, not metal as in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: It’s huge. I LIKE IT.
customer_reviews.text: I can even soak my feet in or bathe my 15 lb. dog.
customer_reviews.author: NancySacTown

customer_reviews.title: Noisey wheels on tile
customer_reviews.text: Good overall but quite noisey rolling around on tile floors.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Moore

customer_reviews.title: To small and the wheels brake easily
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt even fit my mop inside the bucket I purchased
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Bucket on wheels
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems sufficient. It's a bucket on wheels. No real frills. Bucket is about the right size to mop; wheels roll smoothly; when half full of water, it can still be picked up without too much effort. It's not too top heavy. Price was about right too.
customer_reviews.author: Long

customer_reviews.title: Super Large Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Delivered early. Very easy to use, as it is very large.
customer_reviews.author: lcalla

customer_reviews.title: Go to local store
customer_reviews.text: Two of the wheels broke. Only half there. Straight out of the box. It obviously does not roll.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa White

customer_reviews.title: Works well for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bucket to use for my mop water and it works great. I love having wheels so I don't have to pick up a tub of water all the time. It is a good size and rolls over our tiled floor which has many bumps between every tile.
customer_reviews.author: DDerr

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. very good if you have a concrete drive to wash in whether you use a mitt or a brush this will come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: PAM ERICKSON

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BACK SAVER!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE HAD ONE OF THESE FOR AT LEAST 6 YEARS FOR CLEANING BLDGS AT WORK. TOUGH AND LONG LASTING. I HAVE BEEN LOOKING FOR ANOTHER FOR AT LEAST 3 YEARS SO I WOULDNT HAVE TO LUG THIS ONE AROUND TO ALL THE BLDGS. I HAVENT HAD ANY PROBLEMS WITH THE WHEELS OR HANDLE AND IT IS USED ROUGHLY. PLEASED TO GET ANOTHER!
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Get one to ease household cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Very simple but effective design. Use with sponge mops to easily clean entire kitchen, basement and bath floors. Quickie usually delivers good value. This is no exception. BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: CONSUMER Advocate

customer_reviews.title: Save your back
customer_reviews.text: I use it in my preschool class to fill the water table and empty it daily. So helpful, glides easily and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maha Lubbat

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product appears well made. Glides about effortlessly. Pours easily and is generally good. It is not exactly as pictured. That means that although it may perform well, I was sold one thing and sent another....not sure I like that. The one I received has a totally plastic handle and plastic wheels. I prefer metal where possible or at least getting what I see.
customer_reviews.author: DianaruTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed.
customer_reviews.text: Well designed and we ordered two of them! This was to replace one we had for several years.
customer_reviews.author: Paso Fino

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Mopping is so much easier now. And for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Rolls like a pro. Larger then I expected. Makes mopping so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive & gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a much more expensive rolling bucket, until it broke. This rolling bucket gets the job done - good size, sturdy and easy to move around. A good purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: 1littlenoodle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for linen closet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best solution for storing cleaning supplies in the bathroom linen closet. We had measured our space before hand and selected this model based on size. Rolling in and out of closet very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great Bucket to use for anything.  (I use it even to move heavy stuff around the house)
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket and rolls easily across the floor. I lifted the bucket filled with water and the handle held without breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Bengal Kittens

customer_reviews.title: Clean Wheels
customer_reviews.text: I looked in B,B&B Home Depot Nobody carried this item but you. Can be used, cleaning your house, washing your car, bathing your pets! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hubert Posos

customer_reviews.title: 5 gal rolling bucket
customer_reviews.text: Great bucket! works well when cleaning tile, stone or wood floors. wish the wheels weren't plastic. just be careful not to drop the bucket with water in it. otherwise it's so easy to mop with.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Near Commercial & Institutional-Grade Build Quality and Smart Convenience Features at...
customer_reviews.text: ...an easy on the wallet DIY enthusiast's price! Made by Quickie, a well known in the United States quality home clean up brand name for nearly seven decades. Honest 5 gallon capacity marked off inside by easy to read embossed 1/2 gallon markers. Multiple arches for superior build strength are employed at each free-wheeling caster's corner attachment point, as well as all along the bucket's edge, providing superior confidence of a safe and problem-free proper disposal/transfer pour of the bucket's contents at the end of the project. The free-wheeling (and not lockable) casters make the controlled speed transport of the partially filled bucket over bare floors and low-pile carpeting safe and almost too easy! Definitely worth it's modest price.
customer_reviews.author: TZ1 GUY

customer_reviews.title: Who knew what I was missing!
customer_reviews.text: Seems so basic, a mop with wheels. I did not know how much I was missing they having a standard mop and bucket. I have several apartments that I rent and each time a tenant leaves I do a very thorough cleaning that involves a large scrub brush and essentially mopping the walls with it. This last unit I did I used this mobile mop bucket with it and what a difference. It really saved me a lot of time and back effort
customer_reviews.author: Lil Consumer

customer_reviews.title: A bucket on wheels!
customer_reviews.text: I have had shoulder surgeries which prevent me to carry heavy loads. I needed a container with wheels to carry around my tools when tending my flowers. This solved my problem. I also use it for wheeling my groceries from the car to the house. I don't need to borrow my mopping bucket anymore! I have my own clean bucket to do the job! It seems to be very durable. I expect to use it forever to make my jobs easier.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is perfect for my needs. I looked for one like it at several stores and couldn't find one. The wheels make it easier to use than any other bucket I've seen that wasn't a commercial type. When I'm not using it for my mop I can store all my cleaning bottles in it and they are off the floor. Also I received this item the next day as promised by Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: overlea70

customer_reviews.title: Great mop bucket for home
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and a new sponge mop and the bucket is great. The wheels move easily and the rectangular shaped sponge fits in without splashing. Highly recommend if you are tired of using a round bucket with a rectangular sponge...now if only the sponge mop worked as well.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: high quality, lowest price on the market for a bucket with rollers.
customer_reviews.text: I need to water my outdoor self-watering planter. It holds 5-gallons of water in the reservoir. And it is far away from the faucet. This basket comes perfect for the task. It is very light weight by itself. It has four wheels for easy transporting. Very sturdy. Not to mention the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Zhuang

customer_reviews.title: Decent Mop Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is a lightweight mop bucket that is as expected, comes fully assembled, and is ready to go right out of the box. Love the wheels and maneuverability. It's pretty lightweight, so will see how it holds up - but it is a good bucket for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Barton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and wheels are an added advantage
customer_reviews.text: I love the wheels. I usually use the bucket for gardening purposes and It's so easy to maneuver around. love the wheels on the bucket. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: palvi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully mobile bucket.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bucket! Very easy to move around, plus a good shape for whatever type of mop, etc you want to use with it. This is the second one of this bucket that I have purchased. Because I liked the original one so much, I bought another one to use at a rental that I just purchased. Only one thing for improvement: make the measuring lines and amounts easier to see.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy McGuire

customer_reviews.title: best bucket
customer_reviews.text: bucket on wheels is awesome. worth "splurging" save a lot of headache and spills. Very sturdy plastic.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: What a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The best mop bucket I've had. My favorite part is it has tbe wheels ib the bottom.it's just a little big but if you have the space to store it then it's fine.it's good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Momma bear

customer_reviews.title: Hugh
customer_reviews.text: It is really big.. holds the right amount of water for my task
customer_reviews.author: TJ Phull

customer_reviews.title: ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Exactly what I wanted and needed
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works great for floor mopping! Handle is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: *Mesa*Mom*

customer_reviews.title: my bucket wheel
customer_reviews.text: it is really wide enough to put my mop in side. the size how much water to put in it is really perfect on the top of all that have wheels it is so easy to move it around. i really love it.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Not supposed to be lifting, so I got this bucket. It's perfect for emptying my fish tanks. Just scoot it out the door and pure the water from the porch into the flower beds.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C.

customer_reviews.title: Big bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Was a lot bigger than I thought it would be . When full still easy to move
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great buckets
customer_reviews.text: So nice to not have to lug around large heavy bucket of water.
customer_reviews.author: YS2014

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wheel
customer_reviews.text: I like having a wide enough bucket to fit my wide headed mop. The wheels are icing on the cake!
customer_reviews.author: AZMA

customer_reviews.title: It's got wheels.
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing more convenient than a bucket with wheels. I love this thing. Pretty solid construction, perfect for my oversize rectangular sponge mop from costco. Now my house is clean, clean, clean. My only hope is that they would make wheels that are safe for hardwood floors.
customer_reviews.author: BobBoy

customer_reviews.title: Not all that pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Not all that pleased with this. It will easily tip over because I believe it is too wide. But it is usable.
customer_reviews.author: Lois W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I love this bucket. I bought two and am glad I had the foresight to do so. They are lightweight, in tact and have 4 wheels. This is going to make my life so much easier. No more lifting buckets to wash floors and I can change my 50 gallon fish tank water with ease. Whew!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: tricey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ease of use to move around the house while I wash floors.
customer_reviews.author: FL2015!

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Not to big, fits perfectly in kitchen sink , Excellent maneuverability.
customer_reviews.author: Omar X

customer_reviews.title: Bucket handle was bend underneath
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is OK for the price to use with the Quickie mop, but mine arrive with the handle bent under the bucket - I had to remove it by bending the bucket a bit and put it back on (kind of a pain and not for the weak).
customer_reviews.author: Roy Fox

customer_reviews.title: Bucket on Wheels arrived. With NO WHEELS
customer_reviews.text: As a bucket I'd give it 5 Stars! As a Bucket on Wheels With NO WHEELS - ZERO Stars Therefore the 3 Star Rating Waiting for the replacement from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kubes

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Good Seller
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is exactly what I needed. I actually received it earlier than expected. The packaging was good and the product is durable and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: not quite as pictured
customer_reviews.text: bucket received was not same as one pictured. handle is entirely plastic with no wire. casters are plastic with no metal. old bucket was exactly like one pictured. had old one many years. not sure if new bucket will last too long. cheaper quality. disappointed did not get bucket pictured.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Durable and lightwieght.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, yet light weight. Durable, too. First one didn't have wheels, but seller made it right immediately.
customer_reviews.author: KBS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the wheels, its a little larger than I expected, but the wheels make mopping so much easier.

customer_reviews.title: Bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is great bucket on wheels! Great for tie-dieing projects and of course cleaning tasks. Maneuverable! Easy on the eye.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy White Eagle Spirit

customer_reviews.title: Quickie Pro Bucket
customer_reviews.text: Like this bucket except for the wheels.. my older model had better wheels. Like the large capacity and the rolling wheels make the job easier.
customer_reviews.author: mrsj

customer_reviews.title: It's a bucket.  On wheels.
customer_reviews.text: It admirably performs all functions of a bucket. On wheels. People who are experienced with wheels will be familiar with the impact they have on this bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Fan

product_meta.title: Quickie EZ-Glide Multi-Purpose 5-Gallon Bucket on Wheels
product_meta.description: Style Name:BucketThe Quickie 5-Gallon Mop Bucket fits all sizes of sponge and wet mops. The bucket features a 5-gallon (2-quart) capacity, molded measuring levels in graduated half gallon marks. This 5-gallon all-purpose bucket moves on multi-directional wheels so it easily glides across the surface of your floor. The heavy-duty wheels are made of soft rubber, turn easily and won’t scratch floors. If you have to lift, the rounded handle grip helps you lift and pour comfortably and securely. A lift grip underneath the bucket is also available for pouring directly into a floor drain. The bucket’s wide design accommodates mops of all sizes. Quickie designs, manufactures and distributes over 300 cleaning products for traditional in-home use as well as contractor and DIY grade applications. The product line includes mops, brooms, dusters, dustpans, brushes, buckets and other supplies.
feature_bullets: Fits all size sponge and wet mops
5-gallon (2-quart) capacity, molded measuring levels in graduated half gallon marks
Wheels made of soft rubber material
Fits all size sponge and wet mops
5-Gallon (2-quart) capacity, molded measuring levels in graduated half gallon marks
Convenient underside lift grip for easy pouring through the pointed spout

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
